data.quote: In using chance operations, the mind is enriched.

data.quote: We have a chance to wind down and expedite the removal of 96 percent of the world's nuclear weapons. data.quote: Musicians are always gigging and never have a chance to stop for a minute.

data.quote: I've got a place in Portugal, which I like very much, but I've just been working in Malaysia for five weeks. My family had a chance to come over and we really loved it, particularly the island of Pangkor.

I had no idea that they would see me completely different.

data.quote: I like chance meetings - life is full of them. Every day, without realising it, I pass people whom I should know.

data.quote: A closing team is so important in the NBA. The last seven minutes is what you are always coaching to get to. data.quote: I want to get to a point in my career where I can be a role model. A good one. I want to say, 'I got here without drugs, and I got here without drinking or smoking. If I can do it, you can do it. I have no doubt.' I really want kids to have a chance in life.

data.category: Life, Good, You Can Do It

data.quote: The moral backbone of literature is about that whole question of memory. To my mind it seems clear that those who have no memory have the much greater chance to lead happy lives.

data.quote: To my mind, it seems clear that those who have no memory have the much greater chance to lead happy lives. But it is something you cannot possibly escape: your psychological make-up is such that you are inclined to look back over your shoulder.
data.author: W. G. Sebald

data.quote: When 'The Sound of Music' aired live on NBC, 18 million people were talking about theater the next day. That's incredible. 'Grease' felt like a chance for me to participate in that landscape.

data.quote: My pride at being a member of the theater community is deep, and we have a chance to reach a lot of people who might feel like there's a place for them. I want theater to be part of the cultural conversation and be on par with all mediums of television in its ability to be relevant.

data.quote: Isn't that what we come into politics for? To say to people: 'You can do it, too - there is a chance to serve your community. There is a chance to shape it co-operatively and democratically, without fear or favour.' And that is what I tried to do.

data.quote: I figure this current era of history is the one with the best chance of quality of life for a black, female, disabled, middle-aged, queer person who's most comfortable not fitting in. The odds still aren't great, mind you. But I'll take my chances with the 21st century.

data.quote: One of the fantastic things about books, fiction or non-fiction, is the way they give you a chance to look into different lives.

data.quote: This is a chance for me to listen and learn. There's no more important and rewarding part of my job.

data.quote: A dream will always triumph over reality, once it is given the chance.

data.quote: The biggest thing, I think, is to stay healthy and make the fewest mistakes, and then you can win... data.quote: You know you have more to offer, and it gets frustrating when you aren't given the chance.

data.quote: Well I guess I like variety pretty much, but I do enjoy this work very much. Particularly with Buddy on the gig, we get a chance to knock each other out It'just wonderful.

data.quote: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.

data.quote: Take heed, then, often to come together to give thanks to God, and show forth His praise. For when you assemble frequently in the same place, the powers of Satan are destroyed, and the destruction at which he aims is prevented by the unity of your faith.

data.quote: I'm thankful to God that my life changed, but I'm also still on my grind.

data.quote: I am thankful for laughter, except when milk comes out of my nose.

data.quote: We are in a wrong state of mind if we are not in a thankful state of mind.

data.quote: I'd like to say to all my fans out there, thanks for the support. And to all my doubters, thank you very much because you guys have also pushed me.

data.quote: All I ever wanted really, and continue to want out of life, is to give 100 percent to whatever I'm doing and to be committed to whatever I'm doing and then let the results speak for themselves. data.quote: I'm thankful to be breathing, on this side of the grass. Whatever comes, comes.

data.quote: It is just that we should be grateful, not only to those with whose views we may agree, but also to those who have expressed more superficial views; for these also contributed something, by developing before us the powers of thought.

data.quote: For what I have received may the Lord make me truly thankful. And more truly for what I have not received.

data.quote: Immensely grateful, touched, proud, astonished, abashed.

data.quote: Be thankful for problems. If they were less difficult, someone with less ability might have your job.
data.author: Jim Lovell

data.quote: God has two dwellings; one in heaven, and the other in a meek and thankful heart.

data.quote: I wouldn't change anything. I've made mistakes, but thanks to those mistakes, I've learned.
data.author: Enrique Iglesias

data.quote: It's been quite a roller coaster ride, but I've grown and learned a lot about myself. The greatest thing is being able to interact with fans and touch people's lives... for that I give thanks.

data.author: William Bennett

data.quote: Whatever life throws at me I'll take it and be grateful for it as well.

data.quote: Never take anything for granted.

data.quote: Feeling gratitude isn't born in us - it's something we are taught, and in turn, we teach our children.

data.quote: It is another's fault if he be ungrateful, but it is mine if I do not give. To find one thankful man, I will oblige a great many that are not so.

data.quote: Every day I've got to be thankful that I am alive, and you never know - the cliche is, I guess, you could get hit by a bus tomorrow, so you'd better be at peace with whatever you got going at the moment.

data.quote: I have nothing to ask for, thanks to God. Everything I have, God has given me.

data.quote: I did not break up the Beatles. You can't have it both ways. If you're going to blame me for breaking the Beatles up, you should be thankful that I made them into myth rather than a crumbling group.

data.quote: I believe that human beings are born first and given passports later. I'm really thankful for my journey. And it's a journey I didn't design.

data.quote: May those who enjoy the faithful ministry of the Word feel exceedingly thankful for it. There are few blessings on Earth greater for a believer and yet the Lord is frequently obliged to teach us the value of this blessing by depriving us of it for a season.
data.author: George Muller

data.quote: If a fellow isn't thankful for what he's got, he isn't likely to be thankful for what he's going to get.
data.author: Frank A. Clark

data.quote: It's important you stay professional and keep working, and I'm thankful for everything that's happened to me.
data.author: Dele Alli

data.quote: I am what I am, I'm doing very well in my life, and I'm thankful to God for that.
data.author: LL Cool J

data.quote: I'm grateful for always this moment, the now, no matter what form it takes.
data.author: Eckhart Tolle

data.quote: I do not so much rejoice that God hath made me to be a Queen, as to be a Queen over so thankful a people.
data.author: Elizabeth I

data.quote: The unthankful heart... discovers no mercies; but let the thankful heart sweep through the day and, as the magnet finds the iron, so it will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings!
data.author: Henry Ward Beecher

data.quote: We can be thankful to a friend for a few acres, or a little money; and yet for the freedom and command of the whole earth, and for the great benefits of our being, our life, health, and reason, we look upon ourselves as under no obligation.
data.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

data.quote: Those who give themselves to prayer should in a special manner have always a devotion to St. Joseph; for I know not how any man can think of the Queen of the angels, during the time that she suffered so much with the Infant Jesus, without giving thanks to St. Joseph for the services he rendered them then.
data.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

data.quote: When you solve a problem, you ought to thank God and go on to the next one.
data.author: Dean Rusk

data.quote: Should it happen tomorrow, I would fall to my knees to give thanks to God for such a career.
data.author: Placido Domingo

data.quote: When you read a piece of writing that you admire, send a note of thanks to the author.
data.author: Sherman Alexie

data.quote: Of all the characteristics needed for both a happy and morally decent life, none surpasses gratitude. Grateful people are happier, and grateful people are more morally decent.
data.author: Dennis Prager

data.quote: I was successful materially, but I know life is much more than worldly success. I saw all these blessings God had given me. The way to give thanks is obedience to God.
data.author: Hakeem Olajuwon

data.quote: We can always find something to be thankful for, and there may be reasons why we ought to be thankful for even those dispensations which appear dark and frowning.
data.author: Albert Barnes

data.quote: It is okay to be an outsider, a recent arrival, new on the scene - and not just okay, but something to be thankful for... Because being an insider can so easily mean collapsing the horizons, can so easily mean accepting the presumptions of your province.

data.quote: I had the pleasure, as Robin said, to live a childhood dream as many young Americans and Puerto Rican children live that play youth baseball. And I feel honored and very thankful for that opportunity.
data.author: Nolan Ryan

data.quote: If I could write a story that would do for the Indian one-hundredth part what 'Uncle Tom's Cabin' did for the Negro, I would be thankful the rest of my life.

data.quote: God made you a masterpiece - be blessed, secure, disciplined and equipped.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: Don't you know there ain't no devil, it's just god when he's drunk.
data.author: Tom Waits

data.quote: Our heavenly Father understands our disappointment, suffering, pain, fear, and doubt. He is always there to encourage our hearts and help us understand that He's sufficient for all of our needs. When I accepted this as an absolute truth in my life, I found that my worrying stopped.
data.author: Charles Stanley

data.quote: Disappointment is inevitable. But to become discouraged, there's a choice I make. God would never discourage me. He would always point me to himself to trust him. Therefore, my discouragement is from Satan. As you go through the emotions that we have, hostility is not from God, bitterness, unforgiveness, all of these are attacks from Satan.
data.author: Charles Stanley

data.quote: I am a person who always tries not to be easily influenced by position or achievement. I thank God for the fact that I can share more kindness and a good quality of life through the popularity. Not for the popularity itself.
data.author: Mario Teguh

data.quote: The word 'Islam' means 'peace.' The word 'Muslim' means 'one who surrenders to God.' But the press makes us seem like haters.
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: Our Lord has written the promise of resurrection, not in books alone, but in every leaf in springtime.
data.author: Martin Luther

data.quote: As a child of God, I am greater than anything that can happen to me.
data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Perhaps nothing helps us make the movement from our little selves to a larger world than remembering God in gratitude. Such a perspective puts God in view in all of life, not just in the moments we set aside for worship or spiritual disciplines. Not just in the moments when life seems easy.
data.author: Henri Nouwen

data.quote: If you expect the blessings of God, be kind to His people.
data.author: Abu Bakr

data.quote: Judge me if you want to. And as a matter of fact, it won't even count, 'cause the only person who can judge is God.
data.author: Kelly Rowland

data.quote: People face difficulties, no matter who you are. I faced difficulties with a lot of things. I face opposition every day, but I didn't kill myself and now, thank God, I'm here.
data.author: Nicki Minaj

data.quote: Non-violence requires a double faith, faith in God and also faith in man.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: A person once asked me, in a provocative manner, if I approved of homosexuality. I replied with another question: 'Tell me: when God looks at a gay person, does he endorse the existence of this person with love, or reject and condemn this person?' We must always consider the person.
data.author: Pope Francis

data.quote: Honesty is of God and dishonesty of the devil the devil was a liar from the beginning.
data.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

data.quote: A man can no more diminish God's glory by refusing to worship Him than a lunatic can put out the sun by scribbling the word, 'darkness' on the walls of his cell.
data.author: C. S. Lewis

data.quote: The Christian life is not a constant high. I have my moments of deep discouragement. I have to go to God in prayer with tears in my eyes, and say, 'O God, forgive me,' or 'Help me.'
data.author: Billy Graham

data.quote: He who learns must suffer. And even in our sleep pain that cannot forget falls drop by drop upon the heart, and in our own despair, against our will, comes wisdom to us by the awful grace of God.
data.author: Aeschylus

data.quote: Beauty is mysterious as well as terrible. God and devil are fighting there, and the battlefield is the heart of man.
data.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

data.quote: Whatever your heart clings to and confides in, that is really your God.
data.author: Martin Luther

data.quote: I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just that his justice cannot sleep forever.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: Bottom line: God will not allow any person to keep you from your destiny. They may be bigger, stronger, or more powerful, but God knows how to shift things around and get you to where you're supposed to be.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: We Marines believe that God gave America the greatest gift He could bestow to man while he lived on this earth -freedom. We also believe He gave us another gift nearly as precious - our soldiers, sailors, airmen, Coast Guardsmen, and Marines - to safeguard that gift and guarantee no force on this earth can ever steal it away.
data.author: John F. Kelly

data.quote: Sir, my concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: I know that there's a god because I was able to survive everything that I've been through - all of the tough times - and I'm still at the top of my game.
data.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

data.quote: If I could give you information of my life, it would be to show how a woman of very ordinary ability has been led by God in strange and unaccustomed paths to do In His service what He has done in her. And if I could tell you all, you would see how God has done all, and I nothing.
data.author: Florence Nightingale

data.quote: The moment I have realized God sitting in the temple of every human body, the moment I stand in reverence before every human being and see God in him - that moment I am free from bondage, everything that binds vanishes, and I am free.
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first.
data.author: Thomas More

data.quote: I believe that life is a journey towards God, and that no one has the right to insist that you go a certain road.
data.author: Pat Buckley

data.quote: When the solution is simple, God is answering.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: My father always taught me that when you help other people, then God will give you double. And that's what has really happened to me. When I have helped other people who are in need, God has helped me more.
data.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

data.quote: I would rather die than do something which I know to be a sin, or to be against God's will.
data.author: Joan of Arc

data.quote: For where God built a church, there the Devil would also build a chapel.
data.author: Martin Luther

data.quote: No man is excluded from calling upon God, the gate of salvation is set open unto all men: neither is there any other thing which keepeth us back from entering in, save only our own unbelief.
data.author: John Calvin

data.quote: In my country of South Africa, we struggled for years against the evil system of apartheid that divided human beings, children of the same God, by racial classification and then denied many of them fundamental human rights.
data.author: Desmond Tutu

data.quote: To my young friends out there: Life can be great, but not when you can't see it. So, open your eyes to life: to see it in the vivid colors that God gave us as a precious gift to His children, to enjoy life to the fullest, and to make it count. Say yes to your life.
data.author: Nancy Reagan

data.quote: Socialism has no moral justification whatsoever; poor people are not morally superior to rich people, nor are they owed anything by rich people simply because of their lack of success. Charity is not a socialist concept - it is a religious one, an acknowledgment of God's sovereignty over property, a sovereignty the Left utterly rejects.
data.author: Ben Shapiro

data.quote: We were born to die and we die to live. As seedlings of God, we barely blossom on earth; we fully flower in heaven.
data.author: Russell M. Nelson

data.quote: The Bible is one of the greatest blessings bestowed by God on the children of men. It has God for its author; salvation for its end, and truth without any mixture for its matter. It is all pure.
data.author: John Locke

data.quote: Forgiveness is God's command.
data.author: Martin Luther

data.quote: Until we meet again, may God bless you as he has blessed me.
data.author: Elvis Presley

data.quote: God removes the sin of the one who makes humble confession, and thereby the devil loses the sovereignty he had gained over the human heart.
data.author: Saint Bernard

data.quote: There is but One God. His name is Truth He is the Creator. He fears none he is without hate. He never dies He is beyond the cycle of births and death. He is self-illuminated. He is realized by the kindness of the True Guru. He was True in the beginning He was True when the ages commenced and has ever been True. He is also True now.
data.author: Guru Nanak

data.quote: God made the Idiot for practice, and then He made the School Board.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: When you find your definitions in God, you find the very purpose for which you were created. Put your hand into God's hand, know His absolutes, demonstrate His love, present His truth, and the message of redemption and transformation will take hold.
data.author: Ravi Zacharias

data.quote: It's up to God to do the judging. You haven't walked in my boots, so how are you going to judge me?
data.author: Aaron Neville

data.quote: Socialism violates at least three of the Ten Commandments: It turns government into God, it legalizes thievery and it elevates covetousness. Discussions of income inequality, after all, aren't about prosperity but about petty spite. Why should you care how much money I make, so long as you are happy?
data.author: Ben Shapiro

data.quote: Allowing myself to love God completely has obviously shed light on my self-love because he loves me more than I could ever love myself.
data.author: Angie Stone

data.quote: There are two kinds of people: those who say to God, 'Thy will be done,' and those to whom God says, 'All right, then, have it your way.'
data.author: C. S. Lewis

data.quote: Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves; and under the rule of a just God, cannot long retain it.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: God is bigger than people think.
data.author: Jimmy Dean

data.quote: My job is to perform, enjoy cricket and thank God for whatever he has given me.
data.author: Suresh Raina

data.quote: God works wonders now and then; Behold a lawyer, an honest man.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Zen does not confuse spirituality with thinking about God while one is peeling potatoes. Zen spirituality is just to peel the potatoes.
data.author: Alan Watts

data.quote: If I am not, may God put me there; and if I am, may God so keep me.
data.author: Joan of Arc

data.quote: We cannot embrace God's forgiveness if we are so busy clinging to past wounds and nursing old grudges.
data.author: T. D. Jakes

data.quote: Kill a man, and you are an assassin. Kill millions of men, and you are a conqueror. Kill everyone, and you are a god.
data.author: Beilby Porteus

data.quote: I think that the greatest gift God ever gave man is not the gift of sight but the gift of vision. Sight is a function of the eyes, but vision is a function of the heart.
data.author: Myles Munroe

data.quote: God is all-full. He is self-contained. He is eternal satisfaction.
data.author: Swami Sivananda

data.quote: I most certainly believe that it is the gift of God that I am what I am. And so I dwell amongst barbarians, a proselyte and an exile, for the love of God.
data.author: Saint Patrick

data.quote: A dark cloud is no sign that the sun has lost his light and dark black convictions are no arguments that God has laid aside His mercy.
data.author: Charles Spurgeon

data.quote: I would love it if people could look at chubby folks with all of our curves, bumps and ridges and just say 'She's beautiful' just like that. You don't have to get on a treadmill as long as your blood pressure is under control and you eat healthy, God bless.
data.author: Yvette Nicole Brown

data.quote: God is the indwelling and not the transient cause of all things.
data.author: Baruch Spinoza

data.quote: It is not fitting, when one is in God's service, to have a gloomy face or a chilling look.
data.author: Francis of Assisi

data.quote: I try to give to the poor people for love what the rich could get for money. No, I wouldn't touch a leper for a thousand pounds; yet I willingly cure him for the love of God.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: Rebellion against tyrants is obedience to God.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Prayer doesn't just change things - it changes us. If we are diligent in seeking God, slowly and surely we become better people.
data.author: Joyce Meyer

data.quote: If you are caught on a golf course during a storm and are afraid of lightning, hold up a 1-iron. Not even God can hit a 1-iron.
data.author: Lee Trevino

data.quote: Being out there in the ocean, God's creation, it's like a gift He has given us to enjoy.
data.author: Bethany Hamilton

data.quote: Salvation brings the soul a deep awareness of God's love. Life takes on more meaning, for it now has a purpose.
data.author: Mother Angelica

data.quote: Man gives you the award but God gives you the reward.
data.author: Denzel Washington

data.quote: We live in a culture that relishes tearing others down. It's ultimately more fulfilling, though, to help people reach their goals. Instead of feeling jealous, remember: If God did it for them, He can do it for you.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: God, give us grace to accept with serenity the things that cannot be changed, courage to change the things which should be changed and the wisdom to distinguish the one from the other.
data.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

data.quote: You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your might. And these words that I command you today shall be on your heart. You shall teach them diligently to your children, and shall talk of them when you sit in your house, and when you walk by the way, and when you lie down, and when you rise.
data.author: Moses

data.quote: Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in to him and eat with him, and he with me.
data.author: Jesus Christ

data.quote: Everything I did, all my actions, all of the problems I had I dedicate to God and to Chile, because I kept Chile from becoming Communist.
data.author: Augusto Pinochet

data.quote: You learn from the things that happen in your career. You get up and down. You never give up. All the things that happened in my career, thank God it happened early rather than late in my career.
data.author: Pablo Sandoval

data.quote: Let us more and more insist on raising funds of love, of kindness, of understanding, of peace. Money will come if we seek first the Kingdom of God - the rest will be given.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: God can cause opportunity to find you. He has unexpected blessings where you suddenly meet the right person, or suddenly your health improves, or suddenly you're able to pay off your house. That's God shifting things in your favor.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: God put us here to prepare this place for the next generation. That's our job. Raising children and helping the community, that's preparing for the next generation.
data.author: Dikembe Mutombo

data.quote: I don't know. Only God knows where the story ends for me, but I know where the story begins. It's up to us to choose, whether we win or lose and I choose to win.
data.author: Mary J. Blige

data.quote: The message is that I was reminding myself and informing others of the fact that God has always been good to me. No matter what you're going through, God is always with us. Life is a journey.
data.author: Andrae Crouch

data.quote: Good man! Genuine gentleman! God bless George Thompson, the great-hearted friend of my race.
data.author: Sojourner Truth

data.quote: Me don't dip on nobody's side. Me don't dip on the black man's side, not the white man's side. Me dip on God's side, the one who create me and cause me to come from black and white.
data.author: Bob Marley
